mapper.insert: /* 회의실 등록 */ INSERT INTO tb_meet_reservation (reservation_num, meet_num, reservation_date, reservation_start_time, reservation_end_time, reservation_contents, reservation_insert_date, applicant_member_num) VALUES (#{reservationNum}, #{meetNum}, #{reservationDate}, #{reservationStartTime}, #{reservationEndTime}, #{reservationContents}, now(), #{applicantMemberNum})
mapper.select: /* 내 예약 조회 */ SELECT * FROM tb_meetingroom as m INNER JOIN tb_meet_reservation as r ON m.meet_num = r.meet_num WHERE applicant_member_num = #{applicantMemberNum} ORDER BY r.reservation_insert_date DESC;
/* 예약 조회 */ SELECT m.meet_num, m.meet_name FROM tb_meetingroom as m INNER JOIN tb_meet_reservation as r ON m.meet_num = r.meet_num GROUP BY m.meet_num, m.meet_name
/* 예약 조회 */ SELECT * FROM tb_meetingroom as m INNER JOIN tb_meet_reservation as r ON m.meet_num = r.meet_num
/* 아이디 가져오기 */ SELECT * FROM tb_meetingroom as m INNER JOIN tb_meet_reservation as r ON m.meet_num = r.meet_num WHERE r.reservation_num = #{reservationNum};

/* 자동 증가 코드 */ SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN CONCAT(#{column}, '_1') ELSE CONCAT(#{column},'_', MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(${column}, CONCAT(#{column}, '_'), -1) AS UNSIGNED))+1) END AS newCode FROM ${table} ;
mapper.insert: /* 회의실 등록 */ INSERT INTO tb_meetingroom (meet_num, meet_name, meet_location, meet_usable_start, meet_usable_end, meet_reg_date, member_num, meet_capacity, meet_detail) VALUES (#{meetNum}, #{meetName}, #{meetLocation}, #{meetUsableStart}, #{meetUsableEnd}, now(), #{memberNum}, #{meetCapacity}, #{meetDetail})
mapper.select: /* 회의실 조회 */ SELECT * FROM tb_meetingroom WHERE meet_num = #{meetNum};
